abstract: Grand Central - 42nd St: Hello, Manhattan! The first stop in the borough on the 7 line is a dining destination in itself.

mobileTitle: Eating Along the 7 Line: Grand Central Terminal
author: AMANDA P. SIDMAN
title: Eating Along the 7 Line: Grand Central Terminal

images.alt: Tuesday January 18th, 2011. NYDN strolled through Grand Central Station today which is a neighborhood unto itself, offering the over 700,000 people who pass through it every day just about anything one might want or need. NYDN stopped by to see the amazing Grand Central Market which features a wonderful array of the freshest meats, fish, fruits, cheeses and much much more. This is Glen Licht of Pescatore Seafood Company with a beautiful fresh red snapper.
images.caption: Glen Licht of Pescatore Seafood Company with a red snapper. Pescatore is located in the Grand Central Market.
